title: Integration of Theory and Practice: Creative Social Problem-Solving Project

context.prior_knowledge: Basic social studies theories and lack of practical experience
context.additional_context: Application of creative learning design to bridge the gap between social studies theory and field experience for in-service professionals

learning_goals: Learners can analyze real-world social issues and design actionable solutions by applying theoretical frameworks.
Learners can produce creative project outcomes collaboratively with team members using digital collaboration tools.
Learners can iteratively refine their project approaches through peer assessment.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
